ing: 2 cups fresh peaches, pitted and chopped
des: "This is the best mango salsa I have ever tasted!  It's a refreshing, cool and spicy salsa that adds excitement to fish, poultry, pork or tortilla chips!  You'll love it!  If you're feeling adventurous, use fresh cilantro instead of basil--wonderful!"
ins:
In a large bowl, mix together the mangoes, peaches or nectarines, garlic, ginger and basil or cilantro.
Add the chilies and lime juice to taste; mix well. Allow to chill 2 hours before serving.
